talks.name: Your Business is under Attack ‚Äì Domain Driven Security state of the art

talks.description: In this talk, we‚Äôll show how Domain Driven Design is used to counteract security weaknesses without one thinking "security" all the time.\nBusiness and technical attacks are two kinds of attacks, where the latter is most famous, e g SQL Injection & XSS. Domain Driven Security is the field that counteracts both categories by using tools and mindsets from DDD.\nThis is the presentation that was awarded Dr M on OPKoKo 15.2 and since then has been brushed up, presented on several continents, and now is a double act with Dan Bergh Johnsson and Daniel Deogun.
